text: Geoffrey James "Geoff" Nicholls (28 February 1948 - 28 January 2017) was a British musician and keyboardist. He was best known as a member of the heavy metal band Black Sabbath. He did not perform with the band after 2004. He was born in Birmingham. Nicholls died from lung cancer on 28 January 2017 at the age of 68. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in England Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:English rock musicians Category:Heavy metal musicians Category:British keyboardists Category:Musicians from Birmingham
title: Geoff Nicholls
